frame.name: Aggregate
frame.definition:
<def-root>This frame contains nouns denoting <fen>Aggregate</fen>s of <fen>Individuals</fen>. The <fen>Aggregate</fen>s may be described by an <fen>Aggregate_property</fen>.
<ex>An <t><fex name="Agg">army</fex></t> <fex name="Individuals">of postal workers</fex> descended on my office.</ex>
</def-root>

FE.name: Individuals
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the people or things that form the <fen>Aggregate</fen>. <ex>A <t>crowd</t> <fex name="Individuals">of hoodlums</fex> filled the plaza.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Aggregate
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the collection of entities that are the <fen>Aggregate</fen>. <ex>A <fex name="Aggregate"><t>crowd</t></fex> of hoodlums filled the plaza.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Aggregate_property
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE describes a property of the <fen>Aggregate</fen> rather than the <fen>Individuals</fen> and is used to tag the adjective that modifies the aggregate noun when it is unambiguous.<ex>A <fex name="Aggregate_property">large</fex> <t>crowd</t> of hoodlums filled the plaza.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Name
FE.definition: <def-root>The term used to refer to the <fen>Aggregate</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Container_possessor
FE.definition: <def-root>The location or political locale that the Organization is contained within.</def-root>

FE.name: Domain
FE.definition: <def-root>The relevant <fen>Domain</fen> as it pertains to the <fen>Aggregate</fen>.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: zwerm.n
lexUnit.definition: van zich samen bewegende of ergens vertonende personen, dieren of zaken
